product_name: Shimano A600 SPD Sport Road Bike Pedals
long_description: The sleek new Shimano A600 SPD sport road bike pedals are the ideal multipurpose performance pedals for any on-road use. They feature SPD functionality just like Shimano's off-road system. Not only are the A600 pedals lightweight, but they allow the use of recessed-style shoe soles for comfortable cleat engagement and walkability when your off the bike. Clipless pedal technology transfers more power from the body directly to the bike; shoes and pedals perform as a single, highly efficient unit. Aerodynamic, single-side SPD design; wide platforms provide efficient power transfer from SPD shoes. Adjustable entry and release tension setting.
short_description: The sleek new Shimano A600 SPD sport road bike pedals are the ideal multipurpose performance pedals for any on-road use. They feature SPD functionality just like Shimano's off-road system.
